songs.title: Change Your Life
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Leigh-Anne Pinnock, Jade Thirlwall & Jesy Nelson]
She captures her reflection then she throws the mirror to the floor
Her image is distorted, screaming, "Is it worth it anymore?" (No, oh)
Are you scared of the things that they might put you through?
Does it make you wanna hide the inner you?

[Pre-Chorus: Jade Thirlwall & All]
You’re not the only one so let them criticize (Ahh-ahh-ahh)
You’re untouchable when you realize, oh-oh-oh

[Chorus: All, Leigh-Anne Pinnock, Perrie Edwards & Jade Thirlwall]
Change, change your life, take it all
We’re gonna stick together, know we’ll get through it all
Change, change your life, take it all (Yeah) (Take it all)
You’re gonna use it to become what you've always known
Become what you've always known

[Verse 2: Leigh-Anne Pinnock, Jade Thirlwall & Jesy Nelson]
His body starts to flicker like nobody wants to know his name
Just another soul with feelings but nobody's there to feel the pain
(No, no, no)
They can rip you, bring you down, down to their size
But they will never get to the heart you hold inside, hmm

[Pre-Chorus: Jade Thirlwall & All]
You’re not the only one so let them criticize (Ahh-ahh-ahh)
You’re untouchable when you realize, oh-oh-oh

[Chorus: All, Leigh-Anne Pinnock, Perrie Edwards & Jade Thirlwall]
Change, change your life, take it all (Uh) (Take it all)
We’re gonna stick together, know we’ll get through it all
(I know, we'll get through it all, oh)
Change, change your life, take it all (Yeah) (Take it all)
You’re gonna use it to become what you've always known
Become what you've always known

[Post-Chorus: All, Leigh-Anne Pinnock & Jade Thirlwall]
Change, change your life (Yeah), take it all (Uh)
(Change your life and take it all)
Change (Uh), change your life (Yeah), take it all
(Change your life and take it all)

[Bridge: Leigh-Anne Pinnock, All & Perrie Edwards]
You got a right to show the world
Something never seen
We want to hear you scream it out
You’re not alone (Whoah-oh-oh-oh, yeah, oh, ahh)

[Chorus: All, Perrie Edwards, Jade Thirlwall & Jesy Nelson]
Change, change your life, take it all (Take it all)
We’re gonna stick together, know we’ll get through it all (We're invicible)
Change, change your life, take it all
(Change your life and take it all)
You’re gonna use it to become what you've always known
Become what you've always known
